string.text:
Renowned for its high production quality and good performance, the SG 550 is often referred to as the finest 5.56 mm rifle ever made. It has a side-folding skeletonised buttstock and a lightweight aluminium bipod that folds into grooves in the lower handguard. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45 compatible suppressor 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] ELCAN SpecterDR, Acog, Barsca AC10632, обра Ё ѕ-8-18, Aimpoint PRO, March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP, OKP-7, C-More, Aimpoint CompM4s, Eotech, Kemper scopes 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] M203 grenade launcher

A Swiss made SIG SG-550 assault rifle. Although it isn't new, it is clear that the previous owner took good care of it: the weapon has been taken apart and put back together with every component fine-tuned for optimum performance, increasing stopping power. The letter "S" has been carved into the stock, along with 16 small notches. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45 compatible suppressor 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] ELCAN SpecterDR, Acog, Barsca AC10632, обра Ё ѕ-8-18, Aimpoint PRO, March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP, OKP-7, C-More, Aimpoint CompM4s, Eotech, Kemper

The SG 552 Commando is designed for urban combat, making it the most compact member of SIG's renowned SG 550 family, which enhances its CQC capabilities. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45 compatible suppressor 
 %c[d_purple] Х %c[ui_gray_2] ELCAN SpecterDR, Acog, Barsca AC10632, обра Ё ѕ-8-18, Aimpoint PRO, March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP, OKP-7, C-More, Aimpoint CompM4s, Eotech, Kemper scopes
